item.title: 埃隆-马斯克赢得薪酬批准，但仍面临特斯拉股价下滑和估值过高的问题
item.description: 特斯拉股东批准了首席执行官埃隆-马斯克 560 亿美元的薪酬方案，这被视为对其领导能力的认可，但这家电动汽车制造商的股票估值仍然很高，即使在股价连续几年疲软之后也是如此。【原文：Tesla shareholders approved CEO Elon Musk's $56 billion pay package in a what was seen as an endorsement of his leadership, but the electric car maker's stock remains richly valued even after several years of weakness in shares.】

item.title: 监管机构称特斯拉将修复中国 5,836 辆进口汽车的软件问题
item.description: 中国市场监管部门周五表示，特斯拉将从7月起修复5836辆进口Model 3、Model S和Model X汽车的软件，理由是存在安全问题。【原文：China's market regulator said on Friday that Tesla would fix software in 5,836 imported Model 3, Model S and Model X cars from July, citing safety issues.】

item.title: 挪威财富基金将在股东大会后继续与特斯拉进行 "建设性对话
item.description: 挪威 1.7 万亿美元的财富基金是特斯拉的第一大股东，在其年度股东大会批准了首席执行官埃隆-马斯克 560 亿美元的薪酬方案后，该基金将继续与这家汽车制造商进行 "建设性对话"。【原文：Norway's $1.7 trillion wealth fund, a top shareholder in Tesla , will continue "a constructive dialogue" with the automaker after its annual general meeting endorsed CEO Elon Musk's $56 billion pay package.】

item.title: 彭博新闻社称，德国试图阻止或缓和欧盟对中国电动汽车征收的关税
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周五报道，德国希望阻止欧盟对中国电动汽车征收的新关税生效，或至少使其软化。【原文：Germany wants to prevent the European Union's new tariffs on Chinese electric vehicles from coming into force or at least soften them, Bloomberg News reported on Friday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，恒大清算律师事务所正在调查普华永道等公司的潜在索赔案
item.description: 三位消息人士称，中国恒大集团清算人指定的律师正在调查该房地产开发商的一些服务供应商，包括其前审计师普华永道，以便为债权人挽回损失。【原文：Lawyers appointed by the liquidators of China Evergrande Group are investigating some of the property developer's service providers including its former auditor PricewaterhouseCoopers, to potentially recoup losses for creditors, three sources said.】

item.title: 投资者本周买入美国成长股，抛售价值股
item.description: 根据博雅全球研究公司（BofA Global Research）的数据，在截至本周三的一周内，投资者抛售了美国价值型股票，买入了成长型股票，这期间的通胀数据低于预期，导致债券收益率走低。【原文：Investors dumped U.S. value stocks and bought growth stocks in the week to Wednesday, according to BofA Global Research, a period marked by cooler than expected inflation data that sent bond yields lower.】

item.title: 中国将维持关键利率不变，保证金压力和人民币疲软阻碍政策放松
item.description: 路透社的一项调查显示，普遍预计中国央行在下周一展期到期的中期贷款时将维持关键政策利率不变。【原文：China's central bank is widely expected to leave a key policy rate unchanged when rolling over maturing medium-term loans next Monday, a Reuters survey showed.】

item.title: 美国制造业团体呼吁加强对中国进口产品的保护
item.description: 在美国总统乔-拜登对中国电动汽车、太阳能电池板和其他战略物资征收高额关税后，一个由美国钢铁工人联合会和国内制造商领导的政策团体呼吁美国对中国进口商品设置更强的贸易壁垒。【原文：A policy group led by the United Steelworkers union and domestic manufacturers is calling for the U.S. to enact stronger trade barriers to Chinese imports after President Joe Biden imposed steep tariffs on Chinese electric vehicles, solar panels and other strategic goods.】

item.title: 债券收益率下降让中国央行面临艰难抉择
item.description: 中国央行遏制金融稳定风险的决心面临着迫在眉睫的考验，因为债券市场的反弹与其对经济的看法背道而驰，其描绘的长期前景是增长疲软和低通胀。【原文：China's central bank faces a looming test of its resolve to curb the financial stability risks it sees in a rallying bond market as it runs counter to its view of the economy by depicting a long-term outlook of soft growth and low inflation.】

item.title: 中国恒大前首席执行官出售香港住宅，价格仅为购买价的近一半
item.description: 据一家房产中介称，中国恒大前首席执行官（中国监管机构最近称其 "无法联系"）已出售其在香港的住宅，损失了 7,400 万港元（约合 948 万美元）。【原文：China Evergrande's former CEO, who Chinese regulators recently said was "uncontactable", has sold his home in Hong Kong at a loss of HK$74 million ($9.48 million) from the purchase price, according to a property agent.】

item.title: 日本核心通胀率将加快，使日本央行有望继续加息
item.description: 路透社周五对18位经济学家进行的调查显示，日本5月份全国核心消费者通胀率可能从上月的2.2%加速至同比2.6%，这使得日本央行有望在未来几个月进一步加息。【原文：Japan's nationwide core consumer inflation likely accelerated to 2.6% year-on-year in May from 2.2% in the previous month, a Reuters poll of 18 economists showed on Friday, keeping the central bank on track to raise interest rates further in coming months.】

item.title: Rystad Energy 首席执行官称，得益于可再生能源，日本到 2060 年将实现能源独立
item.description: Rystad Energy 咨询公司首席执行官 Jarand Rystad 表示，日本是煤炭和液化天然气 (LNG) 的主要购买国，由于太阳能和风能以及蓄电池的发展，到 2060 年，日本将实现能源独立。【原文：Japan, a major coal and liquefied natural gas (LNG) buyer, could be energy-independent by 2060 thanks to expansion of solar and wind power together with storage batteries, said Jarand Rystad, chief executive of the Rystad Energy consultancy.】

item.title: 聚焦：消息称凯雷和德国复兴信贷银行联手收购蒂森克虏伯军舰部门
item.description: 三位知情人士透露，私募股权公司凯雷（Carlyle）和德国复兴信贷银行（KfW）正在商谈联合收购蒂森克虏伯公司潜艇部门的大部分股权，这是乌克兰战争如何重塑欧洲防务部门的最新迹象。【原文：Private equity firm Carlyle and German development bank KfW are in talks to jointly buy most of Thyssenkrupp's submarine unit, three people familiar with the matter said, in the latest sign of how the Ukraine war is reshaping Europe's defence sector.】

item.title: 欧洲 日本央行意外放宽政策、人工智能和教皇
item.description: 安库尔-班纳吉（Ankur Banerjee）对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Ankur Banerjee】

item.title: 日本央行维持利率稳定，决定下月制定债券缩减计划
item.description: 日本央行周五维持利率不变，但表示未来将减少债券购买，以允许长期利率有更大的变动空间。【原文：The Bank of Japan kept interest rates unchanged on Friday but said it would trim bond buying in the future to allow long-term interest rates to move more.】

item.title: 出于安全考虑，微软将推迟发布 Recall AI 功能
item.description: 微软公司周四表示，由于担心隐私风险，微软下周将不会在其新电脑上推出 "Recall"（一种由人工智能驱动的可跟踪电脑使用情况的功能），而是稍后在一小部分人中进行预览。【原文：Microsoft will not roll out "Recall", an AI-powered feature that tracks computer usage, with its new computers next week and will instead preview it with a smaller group later, the tech giant said on Thursday, amid concerns of privacy risks.】

item.title: 亚洲股市下滑，日元在日本央行决议前摇摆不定
item.description: 周五，亚洲股市下跌，原因是投资者在美联储缓和其降息观点后对美国利率前景进行了思考，即使通胀率低于预期。【原文：Asian stocks fell on Friday as investors pondered the outlook for U.S. rates after the Federal Reserve tempered its rate-cut views even as inflation came in softer than expected, while the yen was shaky before the Bank of Japan's policy meeting.】

item.title: 日元在日本央行会议前保持警惕；欧元跌跌不休，周线失守在望
item.description: 周五，在日本央行做出可能进一步削减大规模货币刺激政策的政策决定之前，日元处于守势，而在其他地区，欧元因深陷政治动荡而每周下跌。【原文：The yen was on the defensive on Friday ahead of a policy decision from the Bank of Japan that could see it further reduce its massive monetary stimulus, while elsewhere the euro, mired in political turmoil, was headed for a weekly loss.】

item.title: 需求前景稳健，油价有望每周上涨
item.description: 油价周五下跌，但有望实现四周来的首次周涨幅，因为市场评估了美国利率长期化的影响，以及今年原油和燃料需求的稳健前景。【原文：Oil prices fell on Friday but were on track for their first weekly gain in four weeks as markets assessed the impact of higher-for-longer U.S. interest rates versus solid outlooks for crude and fuel demand this year.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行将在 9 月前维持利率不变，并在第四季度首次降息：路透调查
item.description: 路透社对所有经济学家进行的调查显示，澳大利亚储备银行将在周二的会议上连续第五次维持其关键政策利率不变，原因是价格压力持续存在。【原文：The Reserve Bank of Australia will hold its key policy rate for a fifth straight meeting on Tuesday over persistent price pressures, according to all economists polled by Reuters, a majority of whom expected the first cut to come in the last quarter of the year.】

item.title: 威士卡和万事达卡 300 亿美元费用和解协议岌岌可危
item.description: 威士（Visa）和万事达（Mastercard）拟达成 300 亿美元的反垄断和解协议，以限制商家的信用卡和借记卡费用，但纽约一名法官表示她准备否决该协议，这使该协议岌岌可危。【原文：Visa's and Mastercard's proposed $30 billion antitrust settlement to limit credit and debit card fees for merchants is in peril, after a New York judge signaled she was preparing to reject the accord.】

item.title: 因技术故障，GameStop 将股东大会推迟至 6 月 17 日举行
item.description: 视频游戏零售商 GameStop 表示，由于技术故障，周四举行的虚拟年度股东大会被推迟，没有开展任何业务。【原文：Video game retailer GameStop said that its virtual annual shareholders' meeting on Thursday was postponed without any business being conducted due to technical difficulties.】

item.title: 乐购董事会因首席执行官 1,000 万英镑的薪酬待遇而备受争议
item.description: 英国最大的超市集团乐购（Tesco）将于本周五召开股东年会，届时董事会将被要求说明首席执行官肯-墨菲（Ken Murphy）近 1,000 万英镑（1,300 万美元）薪酬的合理性。【原文：The board of Tesco , Britain's biggest supermarket group, will be asked to justify chief executive Ken Murphy's near 10 million pounds ($13 million) pay package when it faces shareholders at its annual meeting on Friday.】

item.title: 加拿大人承认窃取特斯拉商业机密罪
item.description: 据美国司法部（DOJ）称，一名加拿大籍中国居民周四在纽约联邦法院承认窃取特斯拉电动汽车电池制造商业机密，并密谋将其出售给政府卧底特工。【原文：A Canadian resident of China pleaded guilty in New York federal court on Thursday to stealing Tesla electric-vehicle battery manufacturing trade secrets and conspiring to sell them to undercover government agents, according to the U.S. Department of Justice (DOJ).】

item.title: 美国政府将为口服和鼻腔接种 COVID 疫苗的研究提供高达 5 亿美元的资助
item.description: 美国卫生与公众服务部（HHS）周四表示，它将为中期试验提供高达 5 亿美元的资金，用于评估以鼻腔喷雾或药片形式接种疫苗以预防有症状的 COVID-19 的情况。【原文：The U.S. Department of Health and Human Services (HHS) said on Thursday it will provide up to $500 million for mid-stage trials evaluating vaccines administered as a nasal spray or pill to protect against symptomatic COVID-19.】

item.title: 加拿大议会在罕见会议上就气候政策质询银行首席执行官
item.description: 加拿大五大银行的首席执行官周四向国会议员保证，他们将致力于应对气候变化，但同时表示，减少对化石燃料开采的资助需要时间，而且要实现净零排放还需要做更多的工作。【原文：The CEOs of Canada's big five banks on Thursday reassured members of parliament about their commitment to fighting climate change, but said reducing funding for fossil fuel extraction would take time and more works need to be done to reach net zero emissions.】

item.title: 纽约银行收购了总公允价值为 378 亿美元的 Signature Bank 资产
item.description: 纽约社区银行公司（New York Community Bancorp）周四表示，它收购了倒闭的 Signature 银行的资产，估计总公允价值为 378 亿美元。【原文：New York Community Bancorp said on Thursday it acquired the assets of the failed Signature Bank with an estimated total fair value of $37.8 billion.】

item.title: 五角大楼火箭发射合同花落蓝色起源、SpaceX 和联合发射联盟
item.description: 美国国防部周四选择了蓝色起源公司（Blue Origin）、SpaceX公司和波音-洛克希德合资的联合发射联盟公司（ULA）参与国家安全太空任务的竞争，根据一项价值56亿美元的奖励计划进行初步筛选。【原文：The U.S. Department of Defense on Thursday picked Blue Origin, SpaceX and the Boeing-Lockheed joint venture United Launch Alliance (ULA) to compete for national security space missions, making initial selections under an award program valued at $5.6 billion.】

item.title: 自 2018 年首次批准马斯克的薪酬方案以来特斯拉的表现
item.description: 在特拉华州法院今年早些时候宣布特斯拉薪酬协议无效后，特斯拉股东在关键的年度股东大会上第二次批准了首席执行官埃隆-马斯克 560 亿美元的薪酬方案。【原文：Tesla shareholders have approved CEO Elon Musk's $56 billion remuneration package for the second time at a crucial annual shareholder meeting after a Delaware court invalidated the pay deal earlier this year.】

item.title: 早间竞价：美联储谨慎，日本央行呢？
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】
